price: 75. Markaas waxaan ku dhadhansiin lahayn (cadaab) laban laab ah noloshan iyo (cadaab) labanlaab ah dhimashada kaddib, mana hesheen wax nooga kaa gargaara.
arabic: إِذٗا لَّأَذَقۡنَٰكَ ضِعۡفَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ وَضِعۡفَ ٱلۡمَمَاتِ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ عَلَيۡنَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idhan la-adhaqnāka ḍiʿ'fa al-ḥayati waḍiʿ'fa al-mamāti thumma lā tajidu laka ʿalaynā naṣīran
